duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the design, construction, and maintenance of infrastructures such as bridges, roads, tunnels, water, and sewage systems.
Produce a set of construction documents including drafting, computations, specifications, and cost estimates.
Mentor junior engineers and perform detailed engineering calculations & analysis. Responsible for project schedules and client communications.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in civil engineering from an ABET accredited program. Registered PE license in Ohio is required.
